title: Work is a four letter word: I'm here to be got at (TEFC)
brief_description: Jimmy Dunn, a full time convenor at the Massey Ferguson plant in Coventry is paid by the company but is there to serve the interests of, and listen to the grievances of union members. He feels he is “there to be got at”. How powerful is he and how well does he use that power?
